}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/2AGR9/KPWL0300 2AGR9KPWL0300] (02/22/2017) - [[Kpnetworks KPWL-300]] {{see also|Acelink EW-7955MAC|Edimax}}
===Product Overview=== <small> *[[Acelink EW-7955MN]] 802.11bgn 2.4GHz Solution: :Acelink EW-7955MN is an 802.11b/g/n 2.4GHz Single-Band Mini PCI express module based :on [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA9984 chipset and [[Qualcomm]] Edison QFE1922 Front End Module. :The EW-7955MN supports 20/40MHz and 256-QAM to maximize bandwidth efficiency. :It supports 4T4R (4x4) technology, which runs up to 800Mbps. *Secure Wireless Connection :Incorporated with advanced security encryption, such as 64/128-bits WEP, WPA, :WPA2, and 802.1x, it helps prevent users’ devices from malicious attacks. </small> ===Specifications=== *Host Interface: Mini PCIe *Standard: 802.11bgn *Operating Frequency: 2.4GHz *Chipset: Qualcomm Atheros QCA9984 *Amplifiers: 2x 2.4GHz PA Edison QFE1922 *Antenna Connectors: 4x iPEX (U.FL) :Connectors reserved for 2.4GHz antenna *Operating Voltage: DC 3.3V *Power Consumption: 6.62W *Dimensions: 48mm x 73mm
==Links of Interest== *[[Acelink EW-7955MN]] 4T4R 802.11bgn [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA9984 :Likely used for wireless N clients (2x [[Qualcomm]] Edison QFE1922 PAM) :"1244-00001407-50Z_ES" and "1628" is silkscreened on the blue board. *[[Acelink EW-7955MAC]] 4T4R 802.11an/ac [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA9984 :Likely used for wireless AC clients (4x SKY85405-11 PAM, black PCB) :"1244-00001046-50Z_ES" and "P/C=F64-113" is silkscreened on the board. *[[Acelink EW-7944MAC]] 4T4R 802.11an/ac [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA9990 :Likely used for dedicated backhaul among access points.
==See also== *[[Acelink EW-7955MN]] - Wireless PCIe Module • [http://www.acelink.com.tw/EW-7955MN.html PPage] :2.4GHz 4T4R 802.11bgn (800 Mbps) - supports 20/40MHz and 256-QAM :[[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA9984, [[Qualcomm]] Edison QFE1922 Front End Module *[[Acelink EW-7955MAC]] - Wireless PCIe Module • [http://www.acelink.com.tw/EW-7955MAC.html PPage] :5GHz 4T4R 802.11an/ac (1734 Mbps) - supports 20/40/80MHz and 256-QAM :[[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA9984, [[Skyworks]] SKY85405 Front End Module *[[Acelink EW-7288AC]] - Wireless Range Extender • [http://www.acelink.com.tw/EW-7288AC.html PPage] :5GHz 1T1R 802.11an/ac (150/433 Mbps) - [[Realtek]] RTL8881AM
[[Category:English Documentation]]
